articles.author: Cristian Agatie
articles.title: Volkswagen So Desperate It's Willing To Pay $1 Billion Just To Look at Rivian's Software - autoevolution
articles.description: Rivian and Volkswagen's surprising partnership announcement is the direct result of desperation, Volkswagen to build software, and Rivian to survive
articles.content: As surprising as it seemed, the announced partnership between Rivian and Volkswagen must've been long in the making. The terms of the deal sound great for both companies, at least on paper. Rivian ge… [+5136 chars]
